name: Idle Heroes (itch)
description:
It's a space-themed idle/clicker game. 

The game is intended to be played on a Windows computer, it is played only with the mouse. FYI the mouse cursor is the little gray rocket.

There is currently a hero system to unlock, a level system, a prestige system, a unique talent tree and unique talents purchasable with gems etc etc.

ps : I put a Youtube link for a small tutorial (without sound) just to show how to launch the game once downloaded.
